SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Preconfigured Permission Sets for Salesforce Order Management

Users assigned to a preconfigured permission set receive permissions according to their persona’s required functionality. You can customize a permission set by cloning it and modifying the individual permissions.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

Not all permissions in a preconfigured permission set are required to complete the tasks for the related persona. If you create a custom permission set, use the permission descriptions to match users with the permissions that meet their required capabilities.

This table shows the permissions defined by each preconfigured permission set for Salesforce Order Management.

SYSTEM PERMISSION	DESCRIPTION	SHOPPER	AGENT	OPERATIONS MANAGER	STORE ASSOCIATE	UNMANAGED ORDER SUMMARY USER	OMNICHANNEL INVENTORY MANAGER
Activate Order	Change order status to Activated.	—				—	—
Chatter Enabled For User	User has access to Chatter.					—	
Create & Customize Reports	Create, edit, and delete reports in personal folders.	—				—	—
Create Report Folders	Create report folders and manage these folders if sharing rights allow.	—				—	—
Create Reports In Lightning	Create reports in Lightning Experience, not Salesforce Classic.	—				—	—
Edit Activated Orders	Edit an order record after it’s activated.	—	—		—		—
Edit Delivery Information	Edit Delivery information on the Order Delivery Group Summary record.	—					—
Edit My Reports	Edit personal reports.	—				—	—
Edit Unmanaged Order Summaries	Edit Unmanaged Order Summary records.	—	—	—	—		—
Lightning Console User	Access Lightning console apps.						
Lightning Experience User	Access Lightning Experience and switch between Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic.						
Payment API User	Access CCS Payment APIs.					—	—
Run Flow	Run an active flow. In Experience Builder sites, run an active flow that’s distributed with the Flow Lightning component.						
Run Reports	Run reports and dashboards.	—				—	—
Omnichannel Inventory Sync	Access Omnichannel Inventory Sync.	—	—	—	—	—	
Submit Macros Allowed	Permission to submit macros.						—
Use Add Order Item Summary API	Permission to use Add Order Item Summary API.	—				—	—
Use Fulfillment API	Permission to use Fulfillment Order API.					—	—
Use Order Management API	Permission to use Order Management API.					—	—
Use Order Summary Create API	Permission to use Order Summary Create API.	—	—	—	—		—
Use Repricing	Allow the user to use the repricing feature in Order Management.					—	—
Edit Repricing	Allow the user to edit repricing information, such as web store, integration, and other repricing setup.	—	—		—	—	—
Use Return Order	Permission to use Return Order feature in Order Management.					—	—
Use Return Order API	Permission to use Return Order API.					—	—
Use Shipment	Permission to use Shipment in Order Management.					—	—
Use Omnichannel Inventory API	Permission to use Omnichannel Inventory API.					—	

Key

	Enabled by the preconfigured permission set.
	Disabled by the preconfigured permission set.
—	Not included in the permission set and can’t be added to a cloned permission set.

title: Preconfigured Permission Sets for Salesforce Order Management
